Uses of Class
Storage.Task

    • Uses of Task in Storage

      Methods in Storage that return Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Task DataFile.getTask(int id)
      Given id, returns Task object.
      Methods in Storage that return types with arguments of type Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Task> DataFile.getAllTasks()
      Returns an unmodifiable view of the list of all tasks.
      List<Task> DataFile.getDeletedTasks()
      Returns an unmodifiable view of the list of deleted tasks.
      List<Task> DataFile.getDoneTasks()
      Returns an unmodifiable view of the list of done tasks.
      List<Task> DataFile.getToDoTasks()
      Returns an unmodifiable view of the list of to-do tasks.
      Methods in Storage with parameters of type Task 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean DataFile.addNewTask(Task task)
      Adds a new to-do task to lists and file.
      boolean DataFile.deleteTask(Task task)
      Deletes Task object provided in argument.
      boolean DataFile.doneTask(Task task)
      Marks Task object provided in argument as done.
      boolean DataFile.restoreTask(Task task)
      Restores deleted Task object provided in argument.
      boolean DataFile.toDoTask(Task task)
      Marks Task object provided in argument as to-do.
      boolean DataFile.updateTaskInfo(Task task, String name, DateTime due, DateTime start, DateTime end, List<String> tags)
      Updates Task object's attributes with provided arguments.
      boolean DataFile.wipeTask(Task task)
      Permanently deletes Task object provided in argument.
      Constructors in Storage with parameters of type Task 
      Constructor and Description
      Task(Task task)
      Cloning constructor.
